attributes.action: STOP THE NEW LOWER THAMES CROSSING INTO ESSEX
attributes.additional_details:
To try and stop the proposed new lower Thames crossing into Essex. People's lives in the Thurrock area
have been ruined by the congestion and pollution caused by the Dartford river crossing for years as it is,now they propose to build a new crossing to the east of the borough, right through Coalhouse Fort, a heritage fort. There is no need for this crossing, just stop the tolls and make the crossing free to pass, this will stop the congestion.
